name: Helhats
description:
Helhats is a topdown roguelike dungeon crawler.

You have been trapped in a computer simulation that you have to try and escape from, to ensure that you can't escape the person that trapped you in there removed critical parts of the simulation leaving it incomplete. each run you make you have to get stronger, build upon the simulation and also weakening it.

Install viruses, develop bots that run parallel to you runs, download blueprints on all different kinds of malware and then install them, collect bits of data with each run to help fight the simulation.

Helhats has a huge pool of rooms to select from when creating the dungeons for each run, the layout and spawns are different with each run but the rooms were all 'Hand made'.
